content:
EntityDataSourceView Class

Definition

Supports the EntityDataSource control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform queries and other operations against entity data.

In this Article

public class EntityDataSourceView : System.Web.UI.DataSourceView, System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Inheritance
Object
DataSourceView
EntityDataSourceView

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()
CanExecute(String)
DataSourceViewChanged
Delete(IDictionary, IDictionary, DataSourceViewOperationCallback)
Events
ExecuteCommand(String, IDictionary, IDictionary)
ExecuteCommand(String, IDictionary, IDictionary, DataSourceViewOperationCallback)
Insert(IDictionary, DataSourceViewOperationCallback)
Name
OnDataSourceViewChanged(EventArgs)
RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError(DataSourceCapabilities)
Select(DataSourceSelectArguments, DataSourceViewSelectCallback)
Update(IDictionary, IDictionary, IDictionary, DataSourceViewOperationCallback)

Constructors

EntityDataSourceView(EntityDataSource, String)

Initializes a new instance of the EntityDataSourceView class, setting the specified EntityDataSource control as the owner of the current view.

public EntityDataSourceView (System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource owner, string viewName);
Parameters
owner
EntityDataSource

The data source control that the EntityDataSourceView object is associated with.

viewName
String

A unique name for the data source view within the scope of the data source control that owns it.

Properties

CanDelete

Gets a value that indicates whether the EntityDataSourceView object that is associated with the current EntityDataSource control supports the delete operation.

public override bool CanDelete { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

CanInsert

Gets a value that indicates whether the EntityDataSourceView object that is associated with the current EntityDataSource control supports the insert operation.

public override bool CanInsert { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

CanPage

Gets a value that indicates whether the EntityDataSourceView object that is associated with the current EntityDataSource control supports paging of retrieved data.

public override bool CanPage { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

CanRetrieveTotalRowCount

Gets a value that indicates whether the EntityDataSourceView object that is associated with the current EntityDataSource control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.

public override bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

CanSort

Gets a value that indicates whether the EntityDataSourceView object that is associated with the current EntityDataSource control supports a sorted view of the retrieved data.

public override bool CanSort { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

CanUpdate

Gets a value that indicates whether the EntityDataSourceView object that is associated with the current EntityDataSource control supports the update operation.

public override bool CanUpdate { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

Methods

ExecuteDelete(IDictionary, IDictionary)

Performs a delete operation.

protected override int ExecuteDelete (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);
Parameters
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the entity to be deleted.

oldValues
IDictionary

The values of the entity to be deleted.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows deleted; otherwise, -1, if the operation fails or the number is not known.

ExecuteInsert(IDictionary)

Performs an insert operation.

protected override int ExecuteInsert (System.Collections.IDictionary values);
Parameters
values
IDictionary

The values of the entity to be inserted.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows inserted; otherwise, -1, if the operation fails or the number is not known.

ExecuteSelect(DataSourceSelectArguments)

Performs a select operation.

protected override System.Collections.IEnumerable ExecuteSelect (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments);
Parameters
arguments
DataSourceSelectArguments

The select operation arguments.

Returns
IEnumerable

The result of the select operation.

ExecuteUpdate(IDictionary, IDictionary, IDictionary)

Performs an update operation.

protected override int ExecuteUpdate (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary values, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);
Parameters
keys
IDictionary

The keys of the entity to be updated.

values
IDictionary

The new values of the entity to be updated.

oldValues
IDictionary

The old values of the entity to be updated.

Returns
Int32

The number of rows updated; otherwise, -1, if the operation fails or the number is not known.

GetViewSchema()

Returns a table that represents the EntityDataSourceView.

public System.Data.DataTable GetViewSchema ();
Returns
DataTable

A table that contains the properties of the EntityDataSourceView.

Events

ContextCreated

Occurs when the EntityDataSourceView has finished creating the ObjectContext used to bind data to controls.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs> ContextCreated;

ContextCreating

Occurs when the EntityDataSourceView creates the ObjectContext used in data binding.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> ContextCreating;

ContextDisposing

Occurs before an ObjectContext is disposed.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs> ContextDisposing;

Deleted

Occurs after an object has been deleted from the data source.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> Deleted;

Deleting

Occurs before an object is deleted from the data source.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> Deleting;

Exception

Occurs when validation fails in a partial methods or when an exception is raised.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicValidatorEventArgs> Exception;

Inserted

Occurs after a new object is created at the data source.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> Inserted;

Inserting

Occurs before a new object is persisted to the data source.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> Inserting;

QueryCreated

Occurs after the EntityDataSource has created an Entity SQL query that was specified during the configuration of the EntityDataSource control.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryCreatedEventArgs> QueryCreated;
Attributes
CLSCompliantAttribute

Remarks

For more information, see Applying LINQ Queries to EntityDataSource.

Selected

Occurs after a query has been executed.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs> Selected;

Selecting

Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> Selecting;

Updated

Occurs after changes to an object have been persisted to the data source.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangedEventArgs> Updated;

Updating

Occurs before changes to an object are persisted to the data source.

public event EventHandler<System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs> Updating;

Explicit Interface Implementations

IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState

Gets a value that indicates whether the EntityDataSourceView object is saving changes to its view state.

bool System.Web.UI.IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState { get; }
Returns
Boolean

true if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, false.

IStateManager.LoadViewState(Object)

Restores the previously saved view state for the data source view.

void IStateManager.LoadViewState (object savedState);
Parameters
savedState
Object

The EntityDataSourceView control state to restore.

IStateManager.SaveViewState()

Saves the changes to view state for the EntityDataSourceView control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

object IStateManager.SaveViewState ();
Returns
Object

The object that contains the changes to the EntityDataSourceView control's view state, or null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if there is no view state associated with the object.

IStateManager.TrackViewState()

Tracks view state changes.

void IStateManager.TrackViewState ();
